column4: Hi, i have a qustion about this, damn firefox 3! Is there another browser, this is better than this one in ubuntun......?
Why, what's wrong with your Firefox?
I know a fix for that if it's Flash 10 you're using.
Are you using 10? If so, this kind of explains it, but you have to manually create the file it talks about -- http://blogs.adobe.com/penguin.swf/2008/08/windowless_mode_fix.html
